items.title: Issue Tracking System
items.description: Implement a system to create, update, assign, and track issues/tasks within projects.
acceptance_criteria: Users can create issues with title, description, assignee, priority, and status fields
Users can update issue details and change status
Issues can be filtered and searched by multiple criteria
System maintains a history of changes for each issue
non_functional: System should support at least 100 concurrent users
Average response time for issue operations should be under 2 seconds

notes: The requirement is high-level and vague; assumed core functionality similar to Jira's issue tracking. Additional features like boards, sprints, and reporting may be needed in future iterations.
